Method Detail

getDefinitions

public Definitions getDefinitions(java.lang.String filename)
Description copied from interface: IDefinitionFileProvider
Returns already parsed definitions for the parameter (file reference) if available. If the definition file has not yet been parsed or the definitions are not available for other reasons, null is returned.

Specified by:
getDefinitions in interface IDefinitionFileProvider
